name: cugetdeal
description: CUGETDEAL is a dynamic job posting and management platform, built using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. It simplifies the process of job posting, tracking, and management for both users and administrators.

scripts.start: cd server && npm start & cd ../client && npm start
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm start
